data.name: Joyride Demo
data.detailed_description: In Joyride's Demo, you can try to familiarize yourself with the operation of the game, and at the same time you can experience the official version of the map and try out a route. If you like it, you can try the official version of Joyride. In the official version, you can enjoy the journey as you like. You can also challenge your own record. There are beautiful scenery in different seasons, and each season has completely different scenery. You can also control the drone to observe your driving process, which is very interesting.
data.about_the_game: In Joyride's Demo, you can try to familiarize yourself with the operation of the game, and at the same time you can experience the official version of the map and try out a route. If you like it, you can try the official version of Joyride. In the official version, you can enjoy the journey as you like. You can also challenge your own record. There are beautiful scenery in different seasons, and each season has completely different scenery. You can also control the drone to observe your driving process, which is very interesting.
data.short_description: Joyride Demo is a low-poly style racing game, you will drive your vehicle to drift and corner on the roads of mountains and forests, or drive slowly to enjoy the surrounding scenery, or even operate a drone to watch your driving process, I wish you well transport
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Russian*, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese*, Korean*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: i7-3770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX660
  • Storage: 500 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: i7-10700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1660
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
